quote: We live in this world in order always to learn industriously and to enlighten each other by means of discussion and to strive vigorously to promote the progress of science and the fine arts.
quote_letters: WE LIVE IN THIS WORLD IN ORDER ALWAYS TO LEARN INDUSTRIOUSLY AND TO ENLIGHTEN EACH OTHER BY MEANS OF DISCUSSION AND TO STRIVE VIGOROUSLY TO PROMOTE THE PROGRESS OF SCIENCE AND THE FINE ARTS
